enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: On 3 December, the COP/MOP decided to refer this issue to SBI 27, which considered it briefly in plenary on 5 December (FCCC/KP/CMP/2007/5), before requesting Shuang Zheng (China) to facilitate informal consultations.
These consultations resulted in SBI conclusions, which were adopted by the SBI on 11 December.
